sentences.sContent: He tried to obtain another material by distillation.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tried to obtain another material by distillation.
sentences.sCn: 他试图通过蒸馏法获得另一种物质。

sentences.sContent: Also, in traditional black forest cakes, kirsch, which is a clear colorless fruit brandy which is made from double distillation of morellos is added.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also, in traditional black forest cakes, kirsch, which is a clear colorless fruit brandy which is made from double distillation of morellos is added.
sentences.sCn: 此外，传统的黑森林蛋糕中还会加入樱桃酒，这是一种清澈无色的水果白兰地，由欧洲酸樱桃经两次蒸馏后制成。

sentences.sContent: When carvone begins to distill, the condensation can be seen inside the thermometer adapter, thus the progress of carvone distillation can be readily monitored.
sentences.sContent_eng: When carvone begins to distill, the condensation can be seen inside the thermometer adapter, thus the progress of carvone distillation can be readily monitored.
sentences.sCn: 当香芹酮开始蒸馏时，在温度计转接器内可看到有冷凝，因此能够容易地监察香芹酮的蒸馏过程。

synos.tran: 蒸馏，净化；[化工]蒸馏法；精华，蒸馏物

words.tran: 蒸馏；蒸馏物；蒸馏法；精华（等于distilment或者distillation）
蒸馏；滴下；作为精华产生（等于distil）
蒸馏；提取…的精华；使渗出
